six_hat_analysis.white: Facts: EventPros site at clarksvillewedding.com uses GeoDirectory and Divi. Homepage is working correctly. Some pages have Divi shortcode content rendering as text instead of designed layouts. Need to audit all pages systematically and integrate custom search with designed result cards. Have wp-mcp for WordPress management and puppeteer for browser testing.
six_hat_analysis.red: User is rightfully frustrated with assumptions and wants focused, systematic work. The core pain point is broken page designs that look unprofessional. Directory search functionality is critical for user experience. Need to deliver exactly what's asked without tangents.
six_hat_analysis.black: Risk of making more assumptions. GeoDirectory may have specific template requirements that conflict with custom designs. Page rendering issues could be template-related, plugin conflicts, or Divi Builder activation problems. Search integration might interfere with GeoDirectory's native search.
six_hat_analysis.yellow: Clear scope and objectives. Proper tools available for investigation and fixes. TASKMASTER will maintain focus. Once pages render properly and search works, EventPros will be a fully functional professional directory. Systematic approach will catch all issues.
six_hat_analysis.green: Systematic page-by-page audit using puppeteer screenshots. Test each page's visual design and functionality. Document findings methodically. Use wp-mcp to fix page content/templates. Create comprehensive search integration that works with GeoDirectory.
six_hat_analysis.blue: Process: 1) Complete audit of all pages/views, 2) Fix page design issues systematically, 3) Integrate search functionality thoroughly, 4) Verify everything works end-to-end. Use TASKMASTER to maintain focus and avoid tangents.

data.denoised_plan:
FOCUSED EVENTPROS DIRECTORY COMPLETION PLAN

SCOPE: Systematic audit and fix of all EventPros pages plus search integration
CONSTRAINT: No assumptions - investigate first, then fix what's actually broken  
APPROACH: Methodical page-by-page verification using browser testing

PHASE 1: COMPLETE PAGE AUDIT
- Use wp-mcp to catalog all existing pages/views on EventPros site
- Use puppeteer to screenshot and test each page systematically
- Document design vs. actual rendering issues (Divi shortcodes showing as text)
- Identify which pages need Divi Builder activation or fixes

PHASE 2: FIX PAGE DESIGN ISSUES
- Systematically fix pages showing text instead of designed layouts  
- Ensure proper Divi Builder activation where needed
- Verify GeoDirectory plugin compatibility with custom designs
- Test each fix with browser screenshots to confirm resolution

PHASE 3: SEARCH INTEGRATION  
- Investigate current search functionality behavior thoroughly
- Integrate custom search form with designed result cards display
- Test search end-to-end functionality across all scenarios
- Ensure complete GeoDirectory compatibility throughout

SUCCESS CRITERIA: All pages render as proper designed layouts, search displays custom professional cards
